main event: A detailed report of a UFO sighting on November 13, 1961.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes., The individual driving on a wide road noticed unusual motion in the sky., The description includes a hand-drawn sketch of the UFO with a pinkish reddish color., The individual estimated the object was 1-2 seconds away., The report mentions the possibility of unidentified aerial phenomena with no conclusive identification.
witness description: The witness was a 17-year-old male driving when he observed the object.
